Comment: **TLDR:**  * **The Social Security Administration maintains the country's largest safety net, providing benefits to over** [**73 million Americans**](https://www.ssa.gov/policy/docs/quickfacts/stat_snapshot/)**.**  * **President Donald Trump appointed Leland Dudek as acting commissioner in February.** * **The White House DOGE office has slashed** [**staff numbers**](https://www.businessinsider.com/social-security-offices-doge-cutting-most-customer-service-workers-2025-4) **and the AARP has** [**said**](https://www.businessinsider.com/aarp-warns-social-security-customer-service-retirees-benefits-staff-cuts-2025-4) **that things may get worse.**
Author: thisisinsider
